instructions:
In a 2 quart pot combine the first 3 ingredients while heating and stirring until smooth. Add cooked
broccoli and rice and heat until warm. Serves 4. *(Revised 3/8/00)*
ingredients: 1 can (11 oz) Campbell's Cheddar Cheese soup
1 can (15 oz) elRio Nacho Cheese Sauce (Regular)
1 cup broccoli flowerets, cooked to tender crisp and chopped 1/2 inch
name: Mexican Cheese Soup
creator: Jim Decker
